attributes.action: ban all forms of transport with the exception of motorbikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as there has been a petition for the banning of motorcycles from being brought and sold and used on the british roads,i will to petition this by declairing that all forms of transport other than the use of motorcycles should be banned from the roads, this will allow bikers to uphold their way of life and stop cars/lorrys/buses killing them and useing the exscuse of 'sorry officer, i never see them comming'when they have run them over and killed/maimed them
